data.title: Alejandro Jodorowsky In-Person Retrospective at the Egyptian Theatre
data.meta_description: Chilean-French comic book writer, performance artist, anti-imperialist, psychomagician, and college dropout with anarchic tendencies are just some of the forms taken by avant-garde filmmaker Alejandro Jodorowsky for nearly a century on this earthly plane. The American Cinematheque welcomes Alejandro Jodorowsky in-person for a retrospective guaranteed to conjure up pure movie magic.
data.text:
From May 17 to 19, catch Alejandro Jodorowskyâ€™s The Holy Mountain, Psychomagic, Santa Sangre, El Topo, and more, at the Egyptian Theatre, with the filmmaker himself.

Chilean-French comic book writer, performance artist, anti-imperialist, psychomagician, and college dropout with anarchic tendencies are just some of the forms taken by avant-garde filmmaker Alejandro Jodorowsky for nearly a century on this earthly plane. The American Cinematheque welcomes Alejandro Jodorowsky in-person for a retrospective guaranteed to conjure up pure movie magic.
